title: Tristana rework thoughts????
body:
What do guys think about the Tristana changes? especially to her stats and abilities.

http://am.leagueoflegends.com/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/articles/2015/january_2015/TRSTUP/tristupdate_comic.png&resize=1536:

 E – Explosive Charge
Passive: Whenever Tristana kills a unit, her shot explodes, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.
Active: Tristana attaches a charge to a nearby enemy unit or turret. After a few seconds, the charge detonates, dealing damage to the target and all nearby enemies. Attacking the target with basic attacks amps the charge up, making it deal extra damage as it explodes. Tristana can also Rocket Jump onto a target with Explosive Charge for extra damage.

"Her basic attack speed still increases per level, but the boost is lower than before. This makes Rapid Fire actually important, as she’s not just switching from stupid fast attack speed to soul-crushingly fast attack speed. Her Rocket Jump now deals lower base damage, but can deal way more if she stacks up Explosive Charge on her target before landing on their face."

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/champion-update-tristana

replies.body: Cuter now much better looking, I reckon the new E is neat because it's actually something cool now as opposed to hit E for grievous wounds. I don't play AP Trist but I guess Riot intends to send her to the gravedigger to be buried alongside all the other off meta champ builds that they've removed.

They're removing any traces of Megling Genocide!!

But really, at least take note from the original design, you can give her cute animal ears I will never go against that (you should have enough ideas reading my account name anyway) but I would like her ears smaller.

I wouldn't say it's a rework, it's mostly just VU tho. But still a cool one nevertheless.

I have heard that you guys are removing the line "I wanna shoot something!", please keep it Riot!
I like the new VO lines as Riot Zaps said but personally I think she could have used more changes other than her E. Nice animations though!

I really like the voice line updates!

That aside, I'm pretty excited by the E change - I'm a fan of abilities that can target towers, and I'm looking forward to it being a more obviously impactful skill. The old E was more impactful than the DoT made it appear, which made it difficult to predict how much damage she'd do in a trade.

The ears...

My God...

The ears...

Other than that I'm interested to see if her AP variant will still exist.

I find the new E very interesting, and I'm keen to see how people use it to their advantage. Overall I don't mind the rework, my only problem with it would be the VU. I don't like the ears.
=(
I agree the ears are just terrible to look at

I don't like it, no one else has noticed how clunky she plays like compared to her old self.
The time between clicking and ACTUALLY SHOOTING has been made longer I swear. 
Old Tristana was smooth playing, there's SO much time for punishing Trist in between her clink clunk animations now it makes her almost unviable!

Ok so lets start this with i have not played her on the pbe but
Will the 4 stacks be consumed on the 5th auto when they explode or timed this may effect ap trist big time
Can you qss the stacks
How many points or what level will ap trist need to get max stacks

As an adc she looks great
As ap hmm is she now forced to put points into q or buy attack speed to maximize her e feels counter to what a typical ap does

Maybe we could take the chance and make her r an execute working off this e stacks idea for example base 5% of max hp powering up the more stacks you have for a 20% execute and miner ap scaling % damage or flat what this could do for ad trist is put more decision making on when and who to use her e since one auto could be 20% of a squishy but e a tank auto to 20% then r for maximum performance
While as a full ap this execute would never be able to 100-0 someone 

If ap trist is being forced into putting points into q maybe give her a little ap love attack speed scaling with ap maybe

As for he vu i like it as a base for a typical female yordle oh and peg leg her Buckner skin please
I think that this update is great! When you compare the two, the newer one is better in pretty much any way. The e does kinda annoy me though.
Looks like a female gnar but i like it

She doesn't say 'I wanna shoot something!' anymore :( that's disappointing... But apart from that she looks great :)

I KNEW I should have bought the earnest elf skin at xmas!

Riot Zaps, The extra rocket Jump damage only applies when the mine is at its full stack or whenever the mine is applied on the opponent?

Do the stacks only works with Tristana's auto attack or it also works with the allies auto attacks.

Besides that, the rework is splendid.
I think Riot just gimped her duelling potential by removing the healing debuff from her E and now Vayne has 1 less counter.

I think the new look is awesome, one question though.

What will happen with her splash art? Will Trist get another to match the VU?
She looks like Gnar except more evolved
It's nice to see Megling Prime become Yordle Prime.
Explosive charge = rip turrets

I think the "jump in with rocket jump to deal more damage" idea is HORRIBLE. Tristana is an ADC which means that she needs to stay at the back, not jump in on a target. Tristana is even weaker earlier because it is going to take longer to hit the charge. But I still can't believe the developers/whoever-reworks-champions didn't think "oh, maybe it is a bad idea for an adc to go melee mode on a target." After this rework comes out: Tristana: "I'm GOING IN guys! Sona is low" *Places e on her* Boom lands on Sona. Sona use ult! It was SUPER EFFECTIVE! The enemy Tristana is stunned. Vayne uses AUTO ATTACK! The enemy Tristana fainted. 200 IP rewarded to Sona and Vayne (and their team!).

Edit: And yeah, those ears, uh huh.
Looks like an Asura from guild wars 2 love the new look though

OP tower taker? With IE, Shiv and a maxed out Q she could destroy full-hp towers with 4-5 minions, now she gets to E them too?

Nerf to her attack speed per level AGAIN will fuk her butt tho. She already attacks so slowly early game. I understand its to do with her new E having stacks from autos, but still.

Why does she look like a Gremlin? Gnar is an ancient Yordle with big ears, but look at the "modern" yordles and they have evolved to have smaller ears. (teemo, lulu, poppy etc..)
